name: Arco Zero
hero_image_alt: Arco Zero single-dose grinder in matte black with titanium burr detail visible through the clear single-dose hopper, bellows on top, a precisely weighed dose of light-roasted beans in the hopper, ground coffee falling into a dosing cup on a precision scale, dark moody lighting with sharp detail on the machined aluminium body
headline: Every gram accounted for.
subheadline: A 64mm flat burr single-dose grinder with titanium-coated burrs, zero retention, and bellows purge — engineered for baristas who weigh every variable.
description_short: A 64mm titanium flat burr single-dose grinder with zero retention and bellows purge, built for the most demanding home baristas.
description_long: The Arco Zero is a single-dose grinder built on a simple principle: what goes in must come out. Its 64mm titanium-coated flat burrs produce an exceptionally uniform particle distribution with virtually zero retention — weigh your beans in, and the same weight comes out as ground coffee. The bellows purge clears the last fraction of a gram from the grinding chamber, ensuring that every shot represents only the beans you chose for it. Stepless micrometric adjustment, a low-RPM motor that minimises heat transfer, and an anti-static outlet complete a grinder that leaves nothing to chance. The Zero is not the grinder for everyone. It is the grinder for people who measure everything.

key_specs.motor: Brushless DC motor, 800 RPM (low speed, low heat)

whats_in_box: Detailed owner's manual with alignment guide
use_case_headline: Perfect for single-dosing purists who rotate beans frequently.
use_case_body: The Zero was designed for baristas who buy multiple bags at once and want to switch between them without cross-contamination. Weigh a dose, grind it, purge with the bellows, and load a completely different origin — with no flavour carryover from the previous shot.

pairing_products.rationale: The Zero's precision matches the Studio Pro's pressure profiling for a setup that leaves nothing uncontrolled.
The Zero brings modern single-dose precision to the Studio's traditional E61 workflow.
A high-resolution scale (0.01 g) and WDT tool are essential companions for the single-dose workflow.
